price: (8) And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
